abstract: The retailer is bringing in Peterson Milla Hooks, an agency in Minneapolis, to work on its general market creative account. For the last five years, that assignment was handled exclusively by Saatchi & Saatchi.
snippet: The retailer is bringing in Peterson Milla Hooks, an agency in Minneapolis, to work on its general market creative account. For the last five years, that assignment was handled exclusively by Saatchi & Saatchi.
lead_paragraph: Weeks before the crucial Christmas shopping season, J. C. Penney — led by new managers who are grappling with softening sales — is making a big change in its advertising agency roster.

headline.main: J. C. Penney Shakes Up Ad Agency Roster, Just Before Christmas
